name: Endowment Customer Analytics and Profit Reporting
description: Processing of endowment stakeholder customer data for analytics purposes and profit attribution reporting to the Endowment Board

processingActivities.name: Customer Behavior Analysis
processingActivities.description: Analysis of customer purchasing patterns and preferences to generate insights for endowment reporting

dataSubjects.description: Individuals who are customers through endowment programs

processingBasis.justification: Processing is necessary for financial reporting to endowment stakeholder board and improving service quality

risks.description: Unauthorized access to endowment customer data
Inadequate data segregation between endowment and corporate data

endowmentSpecificRisks.description: Commingling of endowment data with corporate data leading to inaccurate reporting

mitigationMeasures.measure: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) with multi-factor authentication
mitigationMeasures.implementation: Azure AD with conditional access policies, limited access to authorized personnel only

mitigationMeasures.measure: Physical and logical separation of endowment data in dedicated database schema
mitigationMeasures.implementation: Separate database schema with restricted access, automated monitoring for cross-contamination

mitigationMeasures.measure: Documented profit attribution methodology with quarterly audits
mitigationMeasures.implementation: Standardized calculation method reviewed by finance and approved by DPO, quarterly verification

mitigationMeasures.measure: Automated data tagging and validation system
mitigationMeasures.implementation: All data tagged with source (endowment/corporate), automated checks prevent commingling

necessityTest.purposeJustification: Processing is necessary to fulfill contractual obligations to endowment stakeholder for transparent profit reporting and to improve service quality for endowment customers
necessityTest.adequacyAssessment: Data collected is limited to what is strictly necessary for analytics and profit calculation. No excessive or irrelevant data is processed.
necessityTest.relevanceAssessment: All data categories are directly relevant to understanding customer behavior and calculating revenue attribution
minimizationMeasures: Collection limited to essential demographics only (age range, not exact birthdate)
Purchase history aggregated to category level where possible
Contact information used only for necessary communications
alternativesConsidered: Anonymous analytics - rejected due to profit attribution requirements
Sample-based reporting - rejected as insufficient accuracy for fiduciary duty
Third-party processor - considered but rejected due to data sensitivity
necessityTest.endowmentConsultationNotes: Consulted with Endowment Data Governance Board on 2025-01-08. Board approved processing with condition of quarterly reviews and strict data segregation.

profitReportingCompliance.separationMechanism: Dedicated database schema 'endowment_data' with separate authentication, access logging, and automated cross-contamination checks

profitAttribution.calculationMethod: Revenue from endowment customer base tracked separately. All revenue from endowment customers attributed 100% to endowment portion as no corporate data is commingled in this processing activity.

transparencyMeasures: Quarterly reports to Endowment Board with detailed methodology
Annual independent audit of data processing and profit calculations
Public-facing privacy notice for endowment customers explaining data use
Designated Endowment DPO contact for inquiries
